com.android.slyce

Class SlyceRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.slyce.requests.SlyceBaseRequest
      • com.android.slyce.SlyceRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceRequestInterface, com.android.slyce.socket.WSConnection.OnTokenListener

    public final class SlyceRequest
extends com.android.slyce.requests.SlyceBaseRequest
implements com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceRequestInterface

    Provides a way to perform visual search without using SDKâ€™s integral camera functionality. Set of asynchronous methods that allow developers to send a request for recognition by providing an Bitmap or an image URL to the image.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlyceRequest

        public SlyceRequest(Slyce slyce,
            OnSlyceRequestListener listener,
            org.json.JSONObject options)
        Parameters:
        slyce - Slyce SDK object. Must be opened before using it.
        listener - the OnSlyceRequestListener to notify of results and errors.
        options - use this JSONObject to pass properties to Slyce servers. Can be null.
